FAQ.question: What is the difference between translation and transliteration?
FAQ.answer: A translation tells you the meaning of words in another language. Google translator, Bing translator, and our own french to vietnamese sentence translation tool, which is free on our website, are some of the prominent translation tools. While a transliteration does not reveal the meaning of the words, it can help you pronounce them correctly. Transliteration changes the letters from one alphabet or language into the corresponding, similar-sounding characters of another alphabet. Therefore, we can say, transliteration changes the letters from one alphabet into the similar-sounding characters of another alphabet. This makes it the simplest and fastest method of typing in vietnamese without practicing any vietnamese keyboard. You can either use the Google input tool for FREE.

FAQ.question: Why do we need translators?
FAQ.answer: The translation is essential for the dissemination of fresh information, knowledge, and ideas around the world. It is vitally necessary to have effective communication amongst people from different cultural backgrounds to be successful. The translation is something that has the potential to alter the course of history through the process of disseminating new information. It is the sole means by which certain people can become acquainted with a variety of works that will help them to broaden their understanding of the world.

FAQ.question: Can I translate french text to vietnamese text on an image?
FAQ.answer: No, at this time, the french to vietnamese sentence translation tool only allows users to transform textual content from french to vietnamese but not text on images. You can use third-party services, such as Yandex to translate words or sentences embedded in images or graphics. If you have a smartphone, you can also download the Google Translate app, which allows you to translate a photo. You must let Google Translate access to your camera for this to work. After that, launch the Google Translate app and touch on the Camera icon to translate any text on the image.
